channel.title: A Conversation on Causality at Our Table

item.title: A Story of Coffee Chat and Research Hypothesis
item.description: Every study starts with a question. How do we frame PICO/PECO? How do we choose outcomes? How do we protect against bias? The daughter asks her father about the very starting point of clinical research.

item.title: Data Have Types: A Coffee-Chat Guide to R Functions for Common Outcomes
item.description: Every study starts with a question. How do we frame PICO/PECO? How do we choose outcomes? How do we protect against bias? The daughter learn R functions for common outcomes from her father.
